mapper.insert: insert into seckill_order (order_id, item_id, user_id, create_time, state, update_by,price) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{itemId}, #{userId}, #{createTime}, #{state}, #{updateBy},#{price})
mapper.select: select o.*, i.item_name, u.login_name, u.email, u.phonenumber,u.money from seckill_order o left join seckill_item i on o.item_id = i.item_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = o.user_id where order_id = #{orderId}

select o.*, i.item_name, u.login_name, u.email, u.phonenumber,u.money from seckill_order o left join seckill_item i on o.item_id = i.item_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = o.user_id where o.user_id=#{userId}
